params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" as \\"EXCH_TYP\\", " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\" as \\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"EXCH_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RATE\\", 'fm99999999999999999990.009999') as \\"EXCH_RATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_EXCH_RATE, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ? " +"order by " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\", " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\", " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\""

"select " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\" as \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_NAME\\" as \\"CUR_NAME\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" as \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_SYMBOL\\" as \\"CUR_SYMBOL\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"DECIMAL_FIG\\" as \\"DECIMAL_FIG\\" " +"from " +" M_CUR " +"where " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\" as \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_NAME\\" as \\"CUR_NAME\\", " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" as \\"EXCH_TYP\\", " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\" as \\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"EXCH_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RATE\\", 'fm99999999999999999990.009999') as \\"EXCH_RATE\\", " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_EXCH_RATE, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +" and(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" != 2 " +" or M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\" = ?) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"

"select " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" as \\"CUR_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_EXCH_RATE, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +" and(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" != 2 " +" or M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\" = ?) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"

"select " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RATE\\" as \\"EXCH_RATE\\" " +"from " +" M_EXCH_RATE, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +" and(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" != 2 " +" or M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\" = ?) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"

"update " +" M_EXCH_RATE " +"set " +" \\"EXCH_RATE\\" = ? " +"where " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" = ? " +" and(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" != 2 " +" or M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\" = ?) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"

"delete from " +" M_EXCH_RATE " +"where " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" = ? " +" and(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" != 2 " +" or M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\" = ?) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\" = to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"

"select " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_EXCH_RATE, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" = TO_NUMBER(?) " +" and(M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_TYP\\" != 2 " +" or M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_RESERVE_CD\\" = ?) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"EXCH_START_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"for update nowait"

"select " +" COUNT(1) " +"from " +" M_EXCH_RATE, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_EXCH_RATE.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\"(+) " +" and M_EXCH_RATE.\\"CUR_CD\\" = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(?),ROWNUM) + 1"
